caption.title: Comparisons of NDVI trends over the globally vegetated areas from 1982 to 2015.
caption.p: ( A) Time series of NDVI. The numbers show the change rates of NDVI, and * indicates the significant changes at a significance level of P < 0.05. ( B) Probability density function of NDVI trends during the two periods, with bars indicating the proportion of increased (gray) and decreased (black) responses. ( C) Mean monthly NDVI trends between the two periods. Shaded area in (A) and error bars in (C) indicate Â±1 SD.
